<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Cloak of Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=2346)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Vitality" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=509" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 256

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** [sustained](/Actions.aspx?ID=2317) for up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You surround yourself in holy light that restores the living and rebuffs undead. You glow with [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=2402) in a 30-foot radius and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=2403) to the next 30 feet. Living creatures that begin their turn adjacent to you recover 4d6 Hit Points. [Undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722) creatures that begin their turn adjacent to you take 4d6 [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509) damage (basic Fortitude save).

---
**Heightened (+2)** The healing increases by 2d6, and the damage to undead increases by 2d6.
name: Cloak of Light
